name: SpinoffSubtitles
description: Adds spinoff subtexts to the main menu.

subtext-type.name: Set Subtext
subtext-type.description:
Sets the game's subtext.

0: None
1: Lite
2: Meltdown
3: World
4: SubZero
5: 2.2
-1: Random

subtext-lite.name: Lite Subtext (Random)
subtext-lite.description: Enables the "Lite" subtext, as seen in GD Lite. Look at the "Set Subtext" setting description to learn how to enable randomization.

subtext-meltdown.name: Meltdown Subtext (Random)
subtext-meltdown.description: Enables the "Meltdown" subtext, as seen in GD Meltdown. Look at the "Set Subtext" setting description to learn how to enable randomization.

subtext-world.name: World Subtext (Random)
subtext-world.description: Enables the "World" subtext, as seen in GD World. Look at the "Set Subtext" setting description to learn how to enable randomization.

subtext-subzero.name: SubZero Subtext (Random)
subtext-subzero.description: Enables the "SubZero" subtext, as seen in GD SubZero. Look at the "Set Subtext" setting description to learn how to enable randomization.

subtext-2point2.name: 2.2 Subtext (Random)
subtext-2point2.description: Enables the "2.2" subtext, as seen in the GD 2.2 trailer. Look at the "Set Subtext" setting description to learn how to enable randomization.

full-ver-btn.name: Full Version button
full-ver-btn.description: Replaces the Editor button with the "Full Version" button.

free-chest-btn.name: Free Chest button
free-chest-btn.description: Replaces the Daily Chest button with the Free Chest button.

free-lvls-btn.name: Free Levels button
free-lvls-btn.description: Replaces the "More Games" button with the "Free Levels" button.
